title: Implement Input Validation
problem_statement: User inputs are not properly validated, leading to potential security vulnerabilities.
suggested_approach: Implement input validation and sanitization using TypeScript libraries.
success_criteria: All user inputs are validated and sanitized.
No security vulnerabilities related to input handling.

title: Implement Structured Error Handling
problem_statement: Current error handling is insufficient and unstructured.
risk_if_unaddressed: Potential for unhandled exceptions leading to application crashes.
suggested_approach: Use try-catch blocks in TypeScript to handle errors gracefully.
success_criteria: All potential error points are covered with try-catch blocks.
Application does not crash due to unhandled exceptions.
